# Up and Down

Imagine an elevator which runs on text instructions, `u` means for the elevator to up a floor and `d` means for the elevator to go down a floor. So if the elevator starts at floor 1, the instructions `uudu` would take the elevator to floor three, while `ddd` would take the elevator to floor -2. Write a method which figures out what floor the following input takes the elevator to:

```
""
```
